function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in per-assay costs of clinical and WBE screening due to geospatial differences and labor costs.","Impact":"Cost estimates may be inaccurate and lead to incorrect budgeting and resource allocation.","Mitigation":"Conduct a thorough cost analysis that considers all factors contributing to per-assay costs, and adjust estimates for geospatial and labor cost variations.","Technologies":"Cost analysis tools, geospatial analysis software, labor cost estimation tools.","People":"Public health officials, healthcare administrators, researchers, policymakers.","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, research institutions, government agencies."},{"Description":"High SARS-CoV-2 load in wastewater, leading to elevated concentrations of viral genomes.","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission through contaminated wastewater, posing a public health threat.","Mitigation":"Implement robust wastewater treatment processes to reduce viral load, and monitor wastewater for early detection of viral presence.","Technologies":"Advanced wastewater treatment systems, viral genome detection and monitoring technologies.","People":"Public health officials, wastewater treatment professionals, policymakers.","Owner":"Wastewater treatment facilities, public health authorities, government agencies."}]}
